SEARCH
Package com.raulrh.tiendatv.gui

Class TelevisionModel

java.lang.Object
com.raulrh.tiendatv.gui.TelevisionModel
public class TelevisionModel extends Object
Model class for managing a list of televisions. Handles adding, removing, updating, and XML serialization/deserialization of television objects.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    TelevisionModel(Window window)
    Constructs a TelevisionModel with a specified Window instance for GUI updates.

  • Method Details

    • getTelevisions

      public ArrayList<Television> getTelevisions()
      Returns the list of televisions.
      Returns:
      the ArrayList of Television objects.

    • addTelevision

      public void addTelevision(Television television)
      Adds a television to the list and updates the GUI.
      Parameters:
      television - the Television object to add.

    • removeTelevision

      public void removeTelevision(Television television)
      Removes a television from the list and updates the GUI.
      Parameters:
      television - the Television object to remove.

    • createTelevisionInstance

      public Television createTelevisionInstance(Class<?> selectedClass, Object[] values) throws ReflectiveOperationException
      Creates an instance of a Television subclass with specified values.
      Parameters:
      selectedClass - the class of Television to instantiate.
      values - the values to set in the Television instance.
      Returns:
      a new instance of the specified Television subclass.
      Throws:
      ReflectiveOperationException - if there is an error creating the instance.

    • updateTelevisionInstance

      public void updateTelevisionInstance(Television television, Object[] values) throws ReflectiveOperationException
      Updates an existing Television instance with new values.
      Parameters:
      television - the Television instance to update.
      values - the new values to set in the Television.
      Throws:
      ReflectiveOperationException - if there is an error updating the instance.

    • existsTelevision

      public boolean existsTelevision(Television television)
      Checks if a television with the same brand and model already exists in the list.
      Parameters:
      television - the Television to check for.
      Returns:
      true if a matching Television exists; false otherwise.

    • saveToXML

      public void saveToXML()
      Saves the list of televisions to an XML file using JAXB. Opens a file chooser to select the file location.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if there is an error saving the file.

    • loadFromXML

      public void loadFromXML()
      Loads a list of televisions from an XML file using JAXB. Opens a file chooser to select the file.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if there is an error loading the file.
